short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of guy and guys with the more gender neutral 'ladies' or 'lady'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of hearing about how "guys" is a gender neutral term. It isn't. Ladies is. This extension gets everyone on the same page by changing guy and guys on each page into lady and ladies.
